2. cTnT (Cardiac Troponin T) - this is a biomarker used to detect heart damage, specifically cardiomyocyte injury.
3. Anthracycline - this is a class of chemotherapy drugs used to treat various types of cancer, including breast cancer, leukemia, and lymphoma. Anthracyclines are known to have cardiotoxic effects, which can lead to heart failure.

Therefore, the chemical entities in the paragraph are cTnT and anthracycline.
